attributes.action: stop local councils from collecting household waste fortnightly.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I live on a new housing estate in the North were all the houses were a trial for the fortnightly household waste collection scheme. During the summer the bins smell, maggots were climbing out of the bins and the flys were everywhere. Even when we put all our waste in black bin liners nothing stops the smell or the flys.
Please lets go back to weekly collections.
